title: Bots in ARAM
body: **RITOOO! I'm so fed up with this! Every single aram game for the past 20 or so games, Ive only versed bots. It was fun for the first few games...but now Im so fed up with it. I miss the actual pvp arams! Am i the only person having this problem?? :/**

replies.body:
I got it the same way.. But it is different in EUW trust me. I dont know why but here in OC if you play ARAM in a lower lvl you have all the time and i mean all the time one in your team who is just running in the enemies tower and 2 or 3 in the other team who play the same way and just die.. 

VERY ANNOYING {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Bots are common in ARAM below level 30 I believe. Once you get to 30 I think you'll end up matched with real players
